message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I'm looking to get at least $200 for it.  Would you be interested in taking a look?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm only able to pay up to $150 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're interested but $150 is below my minimum.  How about we split the difference?  I'll offer it to you for $175.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with $160 for the product.
